author: Kynix @KynixXBT
text: Quick scalp on $WLFI. The idea is we get a bounce at 0.2 and slitghly frontrun that area so 0.21 as entry. 0.18 or so as stop and ideally hold till near 0.3 again. Think this set up makes sense logically and r/r but already exited. Zero conviction myself, hard to trade without it
